Class BackedObject

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.BackedObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<BackedObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fulfillment, Requirement, Task
abstract class BackedObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BackedObject>

Base class for objects that reside in the database.

Creates a BackedObject.

Parameters:
id - The ID for insertion into the database
created - The date the item was created
lastModified - The last modification date
creator - The User who created this Object
repo - The VirtualRepository this Object is wrapped under

delaySaves

public boolean delaySaves(boolean delay)
Optionally temporarily turn off immediate updates to the persistent store. This is a good idea, for example, when about to make a large quantity of changes. Immediately forces a save when re-enabled.

Parameters:
delay - - whether or not to push updates, default: true
Returns:
whether or not the operation was successful
